about_the_game:
A game that seamlessly integrates TRPG, SLG, Idle,Rogue,anime style. Crafted by genuine players, Prepare to embark on a journey that showcases the full extent of my intellect, imagination, and sincerity. Gather your strength, forge bonds, and ascend to the throne of kingship—

・Bringing forth a plethora of possibilities, catering to diverse styles of character construction.

Bringing forth a plethora of possibilities, catering to diverse styles of character construction. Within the game's realm, you have the freedom to assemble an array of powers, drawing inspiration from a build system rooted in tabletop role-playing games.

‘

・Fantasy Adventure

Embark on a breathtaking fantasy odyssey,

blending the allure of rogue elements with the strategic depth of tabletop role-playing adventures.

success or failure hinges not merely on the roll of the dice but on the myriad abilities your character possesses.

Your fate is not solely dictated by chance; rather, it is shaped by your character's prowess,

allowing you to wield various abilities to alter outcomes and carve your own destiny.

・Battle

Engage in meticulously detailed battles within this game.

its unique tactical turn-based combat system unfolds.

Within this system, a plethora of reactive and additional actions are possible,

incorporating intricate timing mechanics and meticulous action management.

﻿

Moreover, numerous "interactive actions" are unlocked only when facing specific enemies or encountering particular scenarios.

These interactive actions, referred to as "combat interactions," include:

﻿

·Engaging in dialogue with sentient adversaries, potentially ending the conflict peacefully or even recruiting them as new allies.·

·Employing a "tail severing" maneuver to neutralize a foe's formidable appendage.

·Exploiting an enemy's petrifying gaze to one's advantage, potentially inducing self-petrification through mirrored reflection.

·Unveiling a demon's true name through "knowledge," then utilizing "chanting" to vanquish or weaken it.

The game harbors additional combat systems:

· For instance, there's the nuanced "debate warfare,"

which involves managing counterarguments and social skill checks to simulate a debate scenario.

· Additionally, there's the imperative of cultivating armies and sustaining morale in the realm of "military combat,"

necessitating ongoing attention to training and morale outside of the battlefield.

・Nurture relationships

In this world brimming with challenges, you are never alone.

Interact with loved ones and companions, embark on side quests, delve deeper into understanding,

and strengthen bonds. Through these interactions, you not only deepen your connections but also foster personal growth.

・Idle develop

A game of incremental development and time management,

where various mechanics demand a slower pace, allowing for a gradual exploration of its delights.

May you discover your own joy and immersion within my game.

detailed_description:
If you encounter performance issues, please give it a try! (White screen, unsmooth operation)

This might be due to not being assigned to high performance mode.

Please try the following steps:

1. Open NVIDIA Control Panel.

2. Go to 'Manage 3D settings'.

3. In the 'Program Settings' tab, find or add a program named 'game.exe'.

4. Set it to use the high-performance graphics processor by default.

After completing these steps, please restart the program.

AMD: For AMD graphics cards, set the game to 'High Performance' in AMD Radeon.

Windows 11 Integrated Graphics: In Windows 11 settings, find 'Display Adapter',

click on 'App Custom Options', then select 'Add an app',

browse and select the game shortcut on the desktop, and set it to 'High Performance Mode' (if you can directly search for 'game.exe', there is no need to add it).

If the issue persists, such as using a low-performance integrated graphics card, please try:

Ttile option → Reduce Weather Particles：ON、Improve combat GPU：ON
